page.title: 02Shopping Centre _ Kennoway
page.content: The shopping centre in Kennoway is situated to the east of{New Road,}the main road through the village. It was built in the early 1960's to meet the needs of a growing population. The centre is set back from New Road and comprises a suite of shops on the ground floor with two floors of residential housing above, in the form of flats. Between the shops and the main road is a landscaped area incorporating a{car park}and a{bus {stance,}which buses, both local and long-distance, use frequently. The facilities to be found in the centre include a{library, dentist, {Chinese take-away, butcher, rent {office, mini-market, chemist and {hairdresser.}Near-by is a{health {centre}and a number of other shops. Although useful, the centre does not meet all the needs of the community.
